Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: That's quite a lamb you have there, sir. The only trouble is, it's back. Gotta put your

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: lamb in a class by himself.

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: Oh, give out the way, fold and patch.

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: Get it out there, fold and patch.

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: Get out the way.

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: I'm not trying to be funny, folks. This lamb is in a class by himself.

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: It's what you do with what you got, that counts.

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: This little lamb is a champion in every sense of the word.

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: Therefore, it is the unanimous decision of your judge and committee

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: that they'll be awarded the breeder a special prize.

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: A special blue ribbon for merit to Jeremiah Kymke.

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: Congratulations, Mr. Kymke.

Text: Oh, Mr. Kymke.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: Hey, you've got a ring, haven't you, you remember that?

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: Got some little lams that weren't even born yet.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: But suddenly I heard a sound from over in the far corner of the pen.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: Something seemed to be moving in the shadows over there.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: There was another baby lamb, and he wasn't white like lams are supposed to be.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: He was black all over.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: Oh, well, I know the nature of the black sheep.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: And I have traded in my dream of a champion racehorse for no count little black lamb.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: But I had a funny feeling that something good was going to come in.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: That little black lamb had happened along just at that particular time for a reason.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: I don't know if you want to know.

Text: Well, now it's this thing, it's fine how to do.
